task.title: Configure the environment variable
task.shortdesc: Use the Environment menu to select and configure the environment variable.

step.cmd: Select the ORACLE_JDBC_DRIVER_PATH link from the list of environment variables. This will open the configuration screen for this variable.
Set the Value field to point to the directory containing the Type 4 driver. This is the drivers directory of the SDEJ installation, e.g. D:\Curam\CuramSDEJ\drivers.
Select OK to confirm the changes.
